title: Victoria, Princess Royal
summary: Victoria, Princess Royal (Victoria Adelaide Mary Louisa;[1][2] 21 November 1840 â€“ 5 August 1901) was German Empress and Queen of Prussia as the wife of German Emperor Frederick III. She was the eldest child of Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom and Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, and was created Princess Royal in 1841. She was the mother of Wilhelm II, German Emperor.
